markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Repair Module](/Feats.aspx?ID=2473) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Android" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=334" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 73 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Frequency**
once per day

</column>

---

You trigger your body's repair programming, causing your body's nanites to heal your wounds. You gain [fast healing](/Rules.aspx?ID=796) equal to half your level for 1 minute. While Repair Module is active, you can't use other abilities that require the use of your nanites.
name: Repair Module
